Description: Detects successful user logins from different states within 3 hours, where at least one state hasn't been logged in from before in the last 2 weeks.
DisplayName: User Login from Different States Within 3 Hours
Name: f78ccd15-6ec1-4cfa-bec4-d9d27d1bb4d5
Query:
let timeframe = ago(3h);
let threshold = 2;
let alerttable =
    SigninLogs
    | where ResultType == 0
    | where Location == "US"
    | where isnotempty(LocationDetails.state)
    | where TimeGenerated > timeframe
    | summarize
        StartTime = min(TimeGenerated),
        EndTime = max(TimeGenerated),
        AccessedStates = make_set(LocationDetails.state)
        by UserPrincipalName
    | extend NumOfStates = array_length(AccessedStates)
    | where NumOfStates >= threshold;
let LocationDetails = SigninLogs
    | where ResultType == 0
    | where Location == "US"
    | where isnotempty(LocationDetails.state)
    | where TimeGenerated > timeframe
    | join kind=inner alerttable on $left.UserPrincipalName == $right.UserPrincipalName
    | extend UnfamiliarState = strcat(LocationDetails.state)
    | summarize
        Applications = make_set(AppDisplayName),
        AuthenticationType = make_set(AuthenticationRequirement),
        Device = make_set(DeviceDetail),
        RiskEvent= make_set(RiskEventTypes),
        RiskEventV2 = make_set(RiskEventTypes_V2)
        by UserPrincipalName, IPAddress, UnfamiliarState;
let IPManagedAttempts = SigninLogs
    | union AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
    | where (tostring(parse_json(DeviceDetail_dynamic).trustType) != "" or tostring(parse_json(DeviceDetail_string).trustType) != "") or (DeviceDetail_dynamic or DeviceDetail_string contains "PII Removed")
    | distinct IPAddress;
let KnownLocations = SigninLogs
    | where TimeGenerated between (ago(14d) .. ago(3h))
    | where ResultType == 0
    | where Location == "US"
    | where isnotempty(LocationDetails.state)
    | summarize UserKnownStates = make_set(LocationDetails.state) by UserPrincipalName;
alerttable
| join kind=inner LocationDetails on UserPrincipalName
| join kind=leftouter KnownLocations on UserPrincipalName
| project-reorder
    StartTime,
    EndTime,
    UserPrincipalName,
    NumOfStates,
    UnfamiliarState,
    AccessedStates,
    UserKnownStates,
    IPAddress,
    Applications,
    AuthenticationType,
    Device,
    RiskEvent,
    RiskEventV2
| project-away UserPrincipalName1, UserPrincipalName2
| where not(UserKnownStates has UnfamiliarState)
| join kind=leftanti IPManagedAttempts on IPAddress
| where Applications has_any ("Microsoft Outlook","Outlook Mobile","Office 365 Exchange Online","My Signins","My Profile","Microsoft Account Controls V2","Office365 Shell WCSS-Client","Office 365 Exchange Online","OfficeHome") // Applications often associated with Evilginx
